parts.name: statement

parts.name: objective
parts.prose: Verify that kein Einsatz von Dark Patterns (by document review, interviews, and sampling of records).

parts.name: guidance

parts.name: objective

parts.name: statement

parts.name: objective

parts.name: statement

parts.name: objective

parts.name: statement

parts.name: objective

parts.name: statement
